title: Introducing Twitch
body:
https://i.imgur.com/sXR9WpO.jpg[]

Yes, I decided to name him Twitch because he's so hyper and such. This picture is the clearest one I have of him. This is him when we brought him home in a small plastic cage.

He's a good boy who loves his human mother. He will join his brothers Remy and Rufus whenever he stops sneezing(though I don't think he's sick, I think he's allergic to us).

You may ask about Twitch.
